titleStmt.title: A man cannot lose his money, but he shall be mockt too, or, Suttle Mals loue to simple Coney, to make him an asse to spend his money to the tune of Oh no, no, no, not yet / [by] M.P.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

titleStmt.title: A man cannot lose his money, but he shall be mockt too, or, Suttle Mals loue to simple Coney, to make him an asse to spend his money to the tune of Oh no, no, no, not yet / [by] M.P.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Groue, dwelling on Snow-hill,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Right half of sheet contains "The second part. To the same tune", author's initials, and imprint.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
